fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier

Interface Classifier<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    KernelSVM<T>, MulticlassClassifier<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleLLSVM, DoublePegasosSVM, DoubleQNPKL, DoubleSAG, DoubleSGD, DoubleSGDQN, GradMKL, LaSVM, LaSVMI, NystromLSSVM, OneAgainstAll, ParzenClassifier, SDCA, SimpleMKL, SMOSVM, TSMKL

    public interface Classifier<T>
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Classifier interface that provides training and evaluation methods.
    Author:
    dpicard
